predicate.note: Frames file for 'default' based on sentences in the WSJ corpus. Comparison with 'fail'.

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: General Electric Pension took control of the 85-title library last month after Color Systems defaulted on the loan .

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Mr. Lloyd said if Qintex had defaulted it could have been required [*-1] to repay $ 92 million [*U*] in debt under its loan agreements .
